events.title: Bloomberg Data Info Session
events.description: Learn about data science opportunities at Bloomberg and network with their recruiting team.

events.title: Soccer Analysis Workshop
events.description: Learn how to build machine learning models to predict soccer match outcomes using historical data and statistics.

events.title: DSC S24 Intro Social
events.description: Join us for our Spring 2024 intro social! Meet the board, learn about upcoming events, and connect with fellow data science enthusiasts.

events.title: Career Workshop
events.description: Get tips on resume building, interview preparation, and navigating the data science job market.

events.title: Climatehack.AI Workshop
events.description: Join us as a CMU team that qualified for the Climatehack.AI finals presents their approach to weather prediction and shares insights from their competition experience.

events.title: Poker AI: RL Workshop
events.description: Introduction to reinforcement learning concepts and how they can be applied to develop poker playing agents.

events.title: Poker AI: Poker Workshop
events.description: Learn poker fundamentals, game theory optimal play, and strategies that will help you develop stronger poker AI agents.

events.title: Poker AI: Sam Ganzfried
events.description: Join us for a talk with Sam Ganzfried, an expert in game theory and poker AI, as he discusses advanced poker AI strategies.

events.title: Poker AI: Jump Trading
events.description: Learn about how poker strategies and game theory are applied in quantitative trading from Jump Trading professionals.

events.title: Poker AI: Tuomas Sandholm
events.description: Special guest lecture by Prof. Tuomas Sandholm on the development of Libratus and the future of poker AI.

events.title: Poker AI: Winner Workshop
events.description: Winning team from the Poker AI competition presents their approach and technical implementation details.

events.title: Youssef Kallel, Apple: MLE Career Talk
events.description: Join us for an insightful talk with Youssef Kallel about his experience as a Machine Learning Engineer at Apple.

events.title: Michael Yoder, UPitt: NLP & Hate Speech
events.description: Learn about cutting-edge NLP techniques for detecting and analyzing hate speech with Dr. Michael Yoder.

events.title: Mentor-Mentee Social GBM
events.description: Connect with your DSC mentors and mentees while enjoying food and fun activities with the data science community.
